_meta.source: Researched from Baja California Tourism, wine region guides, cruise sources

bbox_hint.note: Covers downtown, La Bufadora, Valle de Guadalupe

transit_routes.name: Walk Downtown/Malec√≥n
transit_routes.note: Tourist shops near port. Walk inland for more authentic experience.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to La Bufadora
transit_routes.note: Marine geyser. Best at high tide. Vendor gauntlet to viewing platform.

transit_routes.name: Wine Country Excursion
transit_routes.note: Mexico's premier wine region. 150+ wineries. Need transportation.

featured_experiences.name: Valle de Guadalupe Wine Tour
featured_experiences.note: Mexico's Napa. Book ship excursion or private driver. Great restaurants.

featured_experiences.name: La Bufadora Blowhole
featured_experiences.note: Check tide charts. High tide = best action. Bring cash for vendors.

featured_experiences.name: Fish Taco Quest
featured_experiences.note: Ensenada claims to have invented fish tacos. Seek local spots.
